Key Match Events: The Rockies got key hits in the clutch and another lights-out performance from their bullpen.
Ryan Feltner went toe-to-toe with Detroit ace Tarik Skubal.
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockies should bottle it, study it, and repeat it with their 4-2 road victory over the Tigers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockies won 4-2 over the Tigers on Thursday afternoon at Comerica Park.
Brendan Rodgers (7) celebrated scoring against the Detroit Tigers in the ninth inning.
Others: The Tigers, clinging to hopes of earning an American League wild card, were defeated by the Rockies.
